Docs.typeparam: The type of objects in the list. must implement the interface.
Docs.summary: Represents a generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.GetItem%2A> method does not remove the element at the specified index. To remove an element from the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601>, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.RemoveAt%2A> method.

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert .
Docs.summary: Inserts an element in the at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks After you call <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.Insert%2A>, the elements that follow the insertion point move to accommodate the new element. The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. To replace an element at a specified index, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.SetItem%2A> method.
To determine whether an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601> is read-only, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.ICollectionContract%601.GetIsReadOnly%2A> method.

Docs.exception:
is less than zero.

Docs.param: The index of the element to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes the element at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks After you call <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.RemoveAt%2A>, the elements that follow the removed element move to occupy the vacated spot. The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
To determine whether an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601> is read-only, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.ICollectionContract%601.GetIsReadOnly%2A> method.

Docs.exception:

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to set the element.
The element to set at the specified index.
Docs.summary: Replaces the element at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.SetItem%2A> method replaces the element at the specified index. To add an element to the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601>, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601.Insert%2A> method.
To determine whether an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IListContract%601> is read-only, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.ICollectionContract%601.GetIsReadOnly%2A> method.
